title: Major Disruption on East West Line Due to Train Fault

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Free regular bus services have ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #Queenstown to #JurongEast have resumed. Free regular bus services is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE:Fault cleared, trains are progressively returning to normal speed. Pls cater 10mins travel time from #Queenstown to #JurongEast.
[EWL]: Due to an earlier train fault, pls cater 15 mins travel time from #Queenstown to #JurongEast towards #JooKoon.
[EWL] UPDATE: Free regular bus services are available between #Queenstown and #JurongEast. Updated resumption time at 7:30am.
[EWL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 20 mins travel time from #Queenstown to #JurongEast towards #JooKoon. Train service is still available.
